title: Linux which Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the Linux which command, learn how to locate the path of executable files, and discover advanced usage scenarios with practical examples.

meta.title: Linux which Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the Linux which command, learn how to locate the path of executable files, and discover advanced usage scenarios with practical examples.
meta.keywords: Linux, which command, executable files, command line, file management, system administration

steps.title: Understand the Purpose of the which Command

verify.name: Verify the location of the ls command
verify.hint: The `which` command should return the location of the `ls` command as `/usr/bin/ls`.

steps.title: Locate the Path of Executable Files Using the which Command

verify.name: Verify the location of the hello.sh script
verify.hint: The `which` command should return the location of the `hello.sh` script as `/home/labex/project/hello.sh`.

steps.title: Explore Advanced Usage of the which Command

verify.name: Verify the first occurrence of python in PATH
verify.hint: The `which` command should return the first occurrence of the `python` executable, which should be `/usr/bin/python3`.

verify.name: Verify all occurrences of python in PATH
verify.hint: The `which -a python` command should return all the occurrences of the `python` executable in the PATH, including `/usr/bin/python3`, `/usr/bin/python3.10`, and `/usr/bin/python`.
